headline: Record Backlog and Major NiSource Deal Could Be a Game Changer for Quanta Services (PWR)
summary: Quanta Services recently reported strong third quarter results, featuring record sales of US$7.63 billion, a record-high backlog of US$39.2 billion, raised full-year revenue guidance, and the expansion of its total solutions platform with a major 3-gigawatt infrastructure contract awarded by NiSource. This combination of robust financials and a significant new client partnership highlights the company’s ability to capitalize on rising demand for energy infrastructure, particularly as...
